name: Modiverse
author: admin@softwarenoob.com
description: Modiverse provides a sandbox environment with the ability to create and play mods such as TTT, Deathrun, FortWars, RP, and more! Use the many sandbox tools to build complex worlds with props, lights, thrusters, wheels, and much much more!

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Modiverse install
apt -y update
apt -y --no-install-recommends install curl lib32gcc1 ca-certificates
APP_ID=1549820
## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "Downloading the game as Steam user ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd
./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} +force_install_dir /mnt/server +app_update ${APP_ID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} +quit

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

# Server Configuration 
if [ -f /mnt/server/KJModServer.sh ]; then
    rm /mnt/server/KJModServer.sh
    echo "Removing default script"
fi
if [ ! -d "/mnt/server/KJMod/Binaries/Linux/ServerData" ]; then
        echo "ServerData folder missing....Creating ServerData Folder"
        mkdir -p /mnt/server/KJMod/Binaries/Linux/ServerData
    fi
    if [ -f /mnt/server/KJMod/Binaries/Linux/ServerData/ServerConfiguration.json ]; then
            echo "Config file exists already, skipping config file download"
    else
        echo "Config file missing...Downloading default ServerConfiguration file"
        cd /mnt/server/KJMod/Binaries/Linux/ServerData || exit
        curl -sS -o ServerConfiguration.json https://github.com//parkervcp/eggs/raw/master/steamcmd_servers/modiverse/ServerConfiguration.json
fi
chmod +x /mnt/server/KJMod/Binaries/Linux/KJModServer
echo ""
echo "Installation completed, have fun!"
